upload.title: El convertidor de archivos que te encantará.
upload.subtitle: Todo el procesamiento de imágenes, audio y documentos es hecho en tu dispositivo. Los vídeos son convertidos en nuestros servidores ultra rápidos. Sin límite de tamaño de archivo, sin anuncios y de código abierto.

tooltip.partial_support: Este formato solo se puede convertir a {direction}.
tooltip.video_server_processing: Por defecto, los vídeos se suben a un servidor para ser procesados. Aprende cómo instalarlo localmente aquí.

features.title: Convert PNG to JPG, WebP to JPG, MKV to MP4, WAV to MP3, and any other formats online for free
features.speed: File converter *** works faster than any alternative. Convert images, audio, documents, and videos to any format without delays.
features.local_processing_desc: Images, audio, and documents are converted directly in the browser. Files never leave your device. No delays sending and receiving data from a server. Complete privacy.
features.server_processing_desc: Videos are converted on servers. Upload your file and get results several times faster than competitors. All files are automatically deleted after one hour.
features.all_formats_desc: Convert PNG to JPG, WebP to PNG, MKV to MP4, AVI to MP4, WAV to MP3, DOCX to PDF, PDF to Word online. Support for more than 200 formats including images, audio, documents, and video.
features.no_restrictions_desc: No file size limits. No registration required. Simply upload a file and get results. Completely free online converter.

how_it_works.title: How Online File Conversion Works?
how_it_works.subtitle: Just 3 Simple Steps to Convert Any File

step1.title: Upload File
step1.description: Select an image, audio, document, or video from your device.

step2.title: Select Format
step2.description: Specify which format to convert to. Supports PNG, JPG, WebP, MP3, WAV, MP4, MKV, PDF, DOCX and 200+ other formats.

step3.title: Download Result
step3.description: Get your converted file in just seconds. Images and audio are processed instantly, videos are faster than any alternative.

try_now.title: Try It Right Now!
try_now.description: Upload a file and convert it in seconds. No registration, no limits. Works in all browsers on computer and phone.

external_warning.title: Advertencia del servidor externo
external_warning.text: Si eliges convertir a un formato de video, esos archivos se cargarán en un servidor externo para convertirlos. ¿Quieres continuar?

errors.vertd_server: ¿Qué estás haciendo..? ¡Debes ejecutar el servidor de vertd!
errors.unsupported_format: Solo aceptamos imágenes, vídeos, audios y documentos.
errors.vertd_not_found: No se encontró la instancia de vertd para iniciar la conversión de vídeos. ¿Estás seguro de que la URL es correcta?
errors.worker_downloading: El convertidor {type} se está inicializando actualmente, espere unos momentos.
errors.worker_error: El convertidor {type} tuvo un error durante la inicialización, inténtelo nuevamente más tarde.
errors.worker_timeout: El convertidor {type} está tardando más de lo esperado en inicializarse. Espere unos momentos más o actualice la página.
errors.vertd_generic_body: An error occurred whilst whilst trying convert your video. Would you like to submit this video to the developers to help fix this bug? Only your video file will be sent. No identifiers will be uploaded.
errors.vertd_failed_to_keep: Failed to keep the video on the server: {error}
errors.vertd_details_body: If you press submit, your video will also be attached alongside the error log which is always reported to us for review. The following information is the log that we automatically receive:
errors.vertd_details_footer: This information will only be used for troubleshooting purposes and will never be shared. View our [privacy_link]privacy policy[/privacy_link] for more details.
errors.vertd_ratelimit: Your video, '{filename}', has failed to convert a few times. To prevent server overload, further conversion attempts for this file have been temporarily blocked. Please try again later.
errors.format_output_only: This format can currently only be used as output (converted to), not as input.

zip_file.extracted: Extracted {extract_count} files from {filename}. {ignore_count} items were ignored.

convert.large_file_warning: Due to browser / device limitations, video to audio conversion is disabled for this file as it is larger than {limit}GB. We recommend using Firefox or Safari for files of this size since they have less limitations.

errors.save_failed: ¡No se han podido guardar los ajustes!

appearance.title: Apariencia
appearance.brightness_description: ¿Prefieres una flash-bang soleada o una silenciosa y solitaria noche?
appearance.effect_description: ¿Prefieres efectos en la interfaz o una experiencia más estática?

conversion.title: Conversión
conversion.filename_description: Esto va a determinar el nombre del archivo al ser descargado sin incluir la extensión. Puedes poner las siguientes plantillas en el formato, las cuales serán reemplazadas con la información que les corresponde: %name% para el nombre original, %extension% para la extensión original del archivo y %date% para la fecha de cuando el archivo fue convertido.
conversion.default_format_description: Esto cambiará el formato predeterminado seleccionado cuando subes un archivo de este tipo.
conversion.metadata_description: Esto cambia si los metadatos (EXIF, información de la canción, etc.) del archivo original se conservan en los archivos convertidos.
conversion.quality_description: Esto cambia la calidad por defecto de los archivos convertidos (en su categoría). Valores más altos pueden resultar en tiempos de conversión y tamaños de archivo más largos.
conversion.quality_video: Esto cambia la calidad por defecto de los vídeos convertidos. Valores más altos pueden resultar en tiempos de conversión y tamaños de archivo más largos.

vertd.title: Conversión de vídeo
vertd.description: vertd es un proyecto que actúa como un servidor intermediario ("wrapper") para FFmpeg. Permite convertir vídeos sin dejar de lado la conveniente interfaz web de VERT y, a la vez, aprovecha la potencia de tu GPU para hacerlo lo más rápido posible.
vertd.hosting_info: Alojamos una instancia pública para tu conveniencia, pero es bastante fácil alojar una propia en tu PC o servidor si sabes lo que estás haciendo. Puedes descargar los binarios del servidor [vertd_link]aquí[/vertd_link]. ¡El proceso de instalación será más fácil en el futuro, así que mantente atento!
vertd.speed_description: Esto describe el equilibrio entre velocidad y calidad. Velocidades más rápidas resultarán en una calidad más baja, pero harán el trabajo más rápido.

privacy.title: Privacidad
privacy.plausible_description: Usamos [plausible_link]Plausible[/plausible_link], una herramienta de analíticas orientada a la privacidad para recopilar estadísticas completamente anónimas. Toda la información que recopilamos es anonimizada y agregada, y en ningún momento se envía ni se almacena información que permita identificarte. Puedes ver las estadísticas [analytics_link]aquí[/analytics_link] y excluirte de ellas a continuación:
privacy.cache_description: Guardamos en caché los archivos del convertidor en su navegador para que no tenga que volver a descargarlos cada vez, mejorando el rendimiento y reduciendo el uso de datos.
privacy.site_data_description: Clear all site data including settings and cached files, resetting VERT to its default state and reloading the page.
privacy.clear_all_data_confirm: This will reset all settings & cache, then reload the page. This action cannot be undone.
privacy.all_data_cleared: All site data cleared! Reloading page...
privacy.all_data_clear_error: Failed to clear all site data.

language.title: Lenguaje
language.description: Selecciona el lenguaje que prefieres usar para la interfaz de VERT.

why.title: ¿Por qué VERT?
why.description:
Los conversores de archivos siempre nos han decepcionado. Son feos, están llenos de anuncios y, lo más importante, son lentos. Decidimos solucionar este problema de una vez por todas creando una alternativa que resuelve todo eso, y más.

Todos los archivos (exceptuando vídeos) se convierten directamente en tu dispositivo; esto significa que no hay demoras por subir o bajar archivos de un servidor, y nunca tenemos acceso a los archivos que conviertes.

Los vídeos se suben a nuestro servidor ultra rápido equipado con una RTX 4000 Ada. Tus vídeos permanecen allí durante una hora si no los conviertes. Si los conviertes, el archivo se guarda durante una hora, o hasta que lo descargues. Luego, el archivo se elimina del servidor.

sponsors.title: Patrocinadores
sponsors.description: ¿Quieres apoyarnos? Contacta a un desarrollador en el servidor de [discord_link]Discord[/discord_link] o envía un correo a

donate.title: Donar a VERT
donate.description: Con tu apoyo, podemos seguir manteniendo y mejorando VERT.
donate.payment_failed: Pago fallido: {message}{period} No se ha efectuado ningún cargo.
donate.donation_error: Ha ocurrido un error al procesar tu donación. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
donate.payment_error: Ha ocurrido un error al obtener los detalles del pago. Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
donate.donation_notice_official: Your donations here go to the official VERT instance (vert.sh), and helps to support the development of the project.
donate.donation_notice_unofficial: Your donations here go to the operator of this VERT instance. If you wish to support the official VERT developers, please visit [official_link]vert.sh[/official_link] instead.

credits.title: Créditos
credits.contact_team: Si te gustaría contactar al equipo de desarrollo, por favor usa el email que se encuentra en la tarjeta de "Recursos".
credits.notable_description: Queremos dar las gracias a las siguientes personas por sus importantes contribuciones a VERT.
credits.github_description: ¡Muchas gracias a todos los que han contribuido! [github_link]¿Quieres contribuir también?[/github_link]
credits.no_contributors: Parece que nadie ha contribuido todavía... [contribute_link]¡Sé el primero en hacerlo![/contribute_link]
credits.libraries_description: Muchas gracias a FFmpeg (audio, vídeo), ImageMagick (imágenes) y Pandoc (documentos) por mantener librerías excelentes por tantos años. VERT depende de ellas para proporcionar tus conversiones.

roles.lead_developer: Líder de desarrollo; implementación del backend de conversión e interfaz
roles.docker_ci: Mantenimiento del soporte para Docker y CI

errors.github_contributors: Ocurrió un error mientras se obtenían los contribuidores de GitHub.

errors.general: Ocurrió un error mientras se convertía {file}: {message}
errors.cancel: Error al cancelar la conversión para {file}: {message}
errors.magick: Ocurrió un error en el módulo de Magick, la conversión de imágenes puede que no funcione correctamente.
errors.ffmpeg: No se pudo cargar FFmpeg, algunas funciones podrían no funcionar.
errors.no_audio: No se encontró una pista de audio.
errors.invalid_rate: La tasa de muestreo especificada no es válida: {rate}Hz
errors.pandoc: Error loading Pandoc worker, document conversion may not work as expected.
errors.file_too_large: This file exceeds the {limit}GB browser / device limit. Try Firefox or Safari to convert this large file, which typically have higher limits.

conversion.title: {from} to {to} Converter - Fast & Free Online Tool
conversion.description: Convert {from} files to {to} format online. Fast, secure, and completely free file conversion using client-side processing. No file size limits.

intro.generic: Converting from {from} to {to} is a common requirement for many users. This conversion might be necessary for compatibility with specific software, reducing file size, improving quality, or meeting platform requirements. Our online converter makes this process simple and efficient.
intro.jpg_to_png: Converting JPG to PNG preserves image quality by using lossless compression, making it ideal for images requiring transparency or high fidelity.
intro.png_to_jpg: Converting PNG to JPEG significantly reduces file size using lossy compression, suitable for photographs and complex images.
intro.mp3_to_wav: Converting MP3 to WAV creates an uncompressed audio file, preserving audio quality but increasing file size significantly.
intro.wav_to_mp3: Converting WAV to MP3 reduces file size significantly using lossy compression, making files easier to store and share while maintaining good audio quality.
intro.mp4_to_avi: Converting MP4 to AVI changes the container format, which may be necessary for compatibility with older software or specific video editing tools.
intro.avi_to_mp4: Converting AVI to MP4 provides better compression and wider compatibility with modern devices and web platforms while preserving video quality.
intro.pdf_to_doc: Converting PDF to DOC allows for editable text content, making it possible to modify and update document content.
intro.doc_to_pdf: Converting DOC to PDF preserves document formatting across different devices and operating systems, making it ideal for distribution and printing.

reason.software_compatibility: Compatibility with software that only supports {format}

reason.quality: Different quality characteristics that may be preferable

is_free.question: Is it free?
is_free.answer: Yes. The converter is completely free. No paid subscriptions or hidden payments. All features are available without restrictions.

is_safe.question: Is it safe to upload files?
is_safe.answer: Yes. Images, audio, and documents are converted directly in the browser. They never leave your device. Videos are uploaded to the server but automatically deleted after one hour. We don't store or view your files.

formats_supported.question: What formats are supported?
formats_supported.answer: We support more than 200 formats. Images: PNG, JPG, WebP, HEIC, SVG, GIF, AVIF and others. Audio: MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG, AAC, M4A and others. Video: MP4, MKV, AVI, MOV, WebM, FLV and others. Documents: PDF, DOCX, DOC, HTML, EPUB, ODT and others.

file_size_limit.question: Are there any file size limits?
file_size_limit.answer: No. You can upload files of any size. There are no limits for images, videos, or documents.

registration_required.question: Is registration required?
registration_required.answer: No. Simply open the website, upload a file, and convert. No email, no password, no personal data.

mobile_compatible.question: Does it work on phones?
mobile_compatible.answer: Yes. *** works in all browsers on phones and tablets. The interface is adapted for mobile devices.

why_video_server.question: Why are videos converted on the server?
why_video_server.answer: Video conversion requires a lot of resources. Your phone or computer might not handle it or will work slowly. Our servers convert videos several times faster. All files are deleted after an hour.

quality_loss.question: Is quality lost during conversion?
quality_loss.answer: Depends on the format. During PNG to JPG or WebP to JPG conversion, there might be slight compression. But you can manually adjust quality. Most conversions happen without quality loss.

supported_browsers.question: Which browsers are supported?
supported_browsers.answer: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and other modern browsers. If the browser was released in the last 2-3 years, VERT will work.

batch_conversion.question: Can I convert multiple files at once?
batch_conversion.answer: Yes. Upload several files simultaneously. They will be processed one by one. You can download each file separately or all together as an archive.

metadata_preserved.question: Are file metadata preserved?
metadata_preserved.answer: Depends on the format. In most cases, basic metadata is preserved. If you want to remove metadata, you can use our cleaning tool before conversion.

why_faster.question: Why does *** work faster than other converters?
why_faster.answer: Images, audio, and documents are processed on your device. No server delays. Videos are converted on powerful servers that are 5-10 times faster than regular processors.

description.jpg: a lossy compressed image format ideal for photographs
description.png: a lossless compressed image format supporting transparency
description.gif: a format supporting animated images and simple graphics
description.mp3: a lossy compressed audio format with small file sizes
description.wav: an uncompressed audio format preserving all audio data
description.mp4: a compressed multimedia container format widely compatible
description.avi: a multimedia container format developed by Microsoft
description.pdf: a document format preserving layout across platforms
description.doc: a proprietary document format for Microsoft Word
description.docx: a modern XML-based document format for Microsoft Word

comparison.jpg_png: JPG uses lossy compression while PNG uses lossless compression
comparison.png_jpg: PNG preserves quality but creates larger files compared to JPG
comparison.mp3_wav: MP3 uses lossy compression while WAV is uncompressed
comparison.wav_mp3: WAV preserves all audio data while MP3 reduces file size
comparison.mp4_avi: MP4 offers better compression and cross-platform compatibility
comparison.avi_mp4: MP4 provides more efficient compression than AVI
comparison.pdf_doc: PDF preserves formatting while DOC allows editing
comparison.doc_pdf: DOC allows editing while PDF preserves formatting across platforms
comparison.default: The {from} format has different characteristics than {to}

quality_impact.jpg_to_png: Converting from JPG to PNG will not restore quality lost during the original JPG compression, but it will preserve the current quality using lossless compression.
quality_impact.png_to_jpg: Converting from PNG to JPG will reduce quality due to JPG's lossy compression algorithm. The extent of quality loss depends on the JPG quality setting used during conversion.
quality_impact.mp3_to_wav: Converting from MP3 to WAV will not restore audio quality that was lost during the original MP3 compression. WAV will preserve the current quality level but in an uncompressed format.
quality_impact.wav_to_mp3: Converting from WAV to MP3 will reduce audio quality due to MP3's lossy compression. However, using higher bitrates (192kbps or above) can maintain good audio quality.
quality_impact.mp4_to_avi: Converting from MP4 to AVI typically preserves video quality but may result in larger file sizes depending on the codec used.
quality_impact.avi_to_mp4: Converting from AVI to MP4 typically maintains video quality while reducing file size due to MP4's more efficient compression.
quality_impact.default: The impact on quality depends on the specific formats involved. Converting from a lossy format to another lossy format typically results in some quality loss, while converting to a lossless format preserves existing quality.

summary.title: Summary
summary.description:
VERT's privacy policy is very simple: we do not collect or store any data on you at all. We don't use cookies or trackers, analytics are completely private, and all conversions (except videos) happen locally on your browser. Videos are deleted after being downloaded, or an hour, unless explicitly given permission by you to be stored; it will only be used for the purpose of troubleshooting. VERT self-hosts a Coolify instance for hosting the website and vertd (for video conversion), and a Plausible instance for completely anonymous and aggregated analytics. We use Stripe to process donations, which may collect some data used for fraud prevention.

Note this may only apply to the official VERT instance at [vert_link]vert.sh[/vert_link]; third-party instances may handle your data differently.

conversions.title: Conversions
conversions.description:
Most conversions (images, documents, audio) happen entirely locally on your device using WebAssembly versions of the relevant tools (e.g. ImageMagick, Pandoc, FFmpeg). This means your files never leave your device and we will never have access to them.

Video conversions are performed on our servers because they require more processing power and cannot be done very quickly on the browser yet. Videos you convert with VERT are deleted after being downloaded, or after one hour, unless you explicitly give permission for us to store them longer purely for troubleshooting purposes.

donations.title: Donations
donations.description: We use Stripe on the [about_link]about[/about_link] page to collect donations. Stripe may collect certain information about the payment and device for fraud prevention as described in [stripe_link]their documentation on advanced fraud detection[/stripe_link]. External network requests to Stripe are deferred, and are only made after you click the button to pay.

conversion_errors.title: Conversion Errors
conversion_errors.description: When a video conversion fails, we may collect some anonymous data to help us diagnose the issue. This data may include:
conversion_errors.list_job_id: The job ID, which is the anonymized file name
conversion_errors.list_stderr: The FFmpeg stderr output of your job (error message)
conversion_errors.list_video: The actual video file (if given explicit permission)
conversion_errors.footer: This information is used solely for the purpose of diagnosing conversion issues. The actual video file will only ever be collected if you give us permission to do so, where it will only be used for troubleshooting.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: We self-host a Plausible instance for completely anonymous and aggregated analytics. Plausible does not use cookies and complies with all major privacy regulations (GDPR/CCPA/PECR). You can opt out of analytics in the "Privacy & data" section in [settings_link]settings[/settings_link] and read more about Plausible's privacy practices [plausible_link]here[/plausible_link].

local_storage.title: Local Storage
local_storage.description:
We use your browser's local storage to save your settings, and your browser's session storage to temporarily store the GitHub contributors list for the "About" section to reduce repeated GitHub API requests. No personal data is stored or transmitted.

The WebAssembly versions of the conversion tools we use (FFmpeg, ImageMagick, Pandoc) are also stored locally on your browser when you first visit the website, so you don't need to redownload them each visit. No personal data is stored or transmitted. You may view or delete this data at any time in the "Privacy & data" section in [settings_link]settings[/settings_link].

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions, email us at: [email_link]hello@vert.sh[/email_link]. If you are using a third-party instance of VERT, please contact the hoster of that instance instead.
